channel.title: Run.bat
channel.description:
What i need to write in run.bat?
i use this
@echo off title Heaven-slayer java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.14-ga-bin.jar server
i got newest java and jdk [br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 28, 2009, 03:49:02 pm[/size][hr]I added pause but it still dotn work.

item.title: Run.bat
item.dc:creator: @Olzax Olzax
item.description:
@Olzax wrote:

Try thisâ€¦

@echo off Title RunServer Color f9 Java -Xmx800M server Pause

item.title: Run.bat
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Nader Owner Nader
item.description:
@Owner_Nader wrote:

Add this,

@echo off color 0a title Heaven-slayer java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

item.title: Run.bat
item.dc:creator: @pkkid pkkid
item.description:
@pkkid wrote:

What i need to write in run.bat?

i use this

@echo off
title Heaven-slayer
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.14-ga-bin.jar server

i got newest java and jdk
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 28, 2009, 03:49:02 pm[/size][hr]I added pause but it still dotn work.
